comment.body: i see, so it works good! Do you mind sharing from which hub / URL you copied your hub files? I cloned from Sunhub and faced some issues publishing changes.

@Skylight: i am afraid damaging my profile as i used [ZeroMe Unfuck](/1QHbf72f4vdx3QAxN1LTN9KP19J428Q85R) and @polar2 warned me i should no longer use Create profile page/join hubs. It is mentioned on ZeroMe Unfuck page: "Never click "Create Profile" button again!" Changing ZeroMe hubs unfortunately does not work, because one may loose old posts (they will not appear on ZeroMe). At least that is what happened to me. But new users may join your hub. I would consider creating new user profile, but that way i think i would loose track of old profile mentions from other users.
you have not clonned any particular hub or DLed your hub files from any particular website/repository?
thank you for the advises. No i do not use Skype, i use ZeroMail for private messaging though

@Skybean: Thank you, it can be interesting and also useful for other newcomers, maybe worth if you add it to [my topic](/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1532847835_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS), i follow it.
@Skyboss: yes, only hub admin can set the limits for the users on his hub, when i have profile on other people hub, i have to relly on they be available and raise the limits i needed.
